newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Indonesia rupiah weakens on ample liquidity.
newsitem.headline: Indonesia rupiah weakens on ample liquidity.

text.p: The Indonesian rupiah weakened against the dollar in early trading on Tuesday on ample liquidity, dealers said.
They said there was not much activity yet, with focus on some short-dated swaps ahead of the fiscal year-end on March 31.
Spot rupiah was quoted at 2,405.00/05.30 at 0355 GMT compared with an opening of 2,404.00/05.00.
"Focus was more on some short-dated swaps as liquidity is likely to be tight ahead of the fiscal year-end," one foreign bank dealer said.
